table.name: vtiger_cbreview
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_cbreview` ( `cbreviewid` int(11) NOT NULL, `whyreview` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `reviewitno` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `whoreview` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `whenreview` date NOT NULL, `reviewresulttype` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `whatreview` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbreviewid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_cbreviewcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_cbreviewcf` ( `cbreviewid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbreviewid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
